day2kamar: ^My first morning out of prison... I need money, and I need it fast. I’m barely getting by with what little I have left.
^Maybe I could find some honest work... but who would hire someone like me? A convict fresh out of prison?
^Mom... do you think I could still have a chance to make you proud?...
^Aha!, Oscar... He used to be good to me. He always had something going on. Maybe he could help.
^Whatever happens... I need the money. And Oscar’s the only one I know who can get it fast. I’ll head to the bar. No turning back now.
^Find Oscar at the casino! He usually hangs around somewhere there.
